name: DICEstiny
description:
Features

  • 8 puzzle platformer levels solved by throwing magic dice
  • Physical control over dice, even after they're thrown
  • The dice are embued with magic, such as moving, explosive or shielding powers

Instructions

  • Grab and throw the dice to apply an effect to help your character
  • The resulting number on your dice determine the power of the effect
  • Landing a dice in an effect zone grants you additional multiplier effects
  • Affect the dice results by manipulating the dice, while it's in the air

All assets (code, graphism, sound, music) has been made in 48 hours during the jam.

Just a free pack of VFX has been used : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/cartoon-fx-free-109565

/!\ If you experience performance issue with the web version, consider download windows version !
